posts.title: What is World of Pets – Multiplayer: Walkthrough
posts.description: World of Pets – Multiplayer is a new virtual world game for the iOS and Android platforms..
posts.written4:
Collect, Hatch, and Tame loyal pets in Norris Nuts: World of Pets! A social RPG adventure game where friends set out on a quest to discover hidden secrets and explore colorful new lands!

Enter a land of fantastical animals and colorful characters in World of Pets, a place to meet, play and trade with friends! Explore magical locations together, with their own Quests, Items, and Pets!

Pets start as eggs, once hatched it's up to you to look after them so they can grow bigger! Use potions to create elemental versions of your creatures.

Customize your player and your pets, take them to new areas and take on Quests!

World of Pets is a social place! Meet with friends and make new ones, play, trade, have competitions, and compare styles in the Town Center!

posts.title: FAQ & COINS & GEMS Tips: World of Pets - Multiplayer
posts.description: Whoever has the most precise aim should play as May ..
posts.written:
WHY CAN'T I PURCHASE COINS & GEMS?
On PC and MAC due to Two Factor Authentication, some cards may not be accepted in-game. In these cases, we suggest using PayPay.

WHAT IS XSOLLA LAUNCHER?
Xsolla is a Games Launcher that can be used to launch PC and Mac games, similar to the AppStore and Steam.

For any support issues please use the support section of the World of Pets site and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

OPTIMISING PERFORMANCE IN WOP
WHAT IF I NEED SUPPORT?
Sometimes when playing World of Pets, you may experience a low FPS (frames per second) or frame rate. This may be caused by simply not having a strong enough computer/device to run the game smoothly in your current settings.


Open the options menu in-game and navigate to video settings, you will have a list of options you can adjust to increase performance.

​

I WANT TO REPORT A PLAYER
If someone isn't following the World of Pets community guidelines please send our Support Team a message with the Username of the Player and we will investigate.
